channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Gunman opens fire at Michigan church and sets it ablaze, killing at least 4 and wounding 8
item.description: An ex-Marine smashed a pickup into a Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints church in Michigan, opened fire and set the building ablaze during a crowded Sunday service and then was fatally shot by police.
